hero.title: Build Real Projects with
hero.subtitle: Join our 3-week intensive workshop where students build production websites for real clients using AI development tools. Work with Harvard Medical School projects and learn from industry professionals.

features.title: Workshop
features.subtitle: Our intensive 3-week program mirrors professional software development cycles, preparing students for real-world tech careers.

clientRequirements.title: Client Requirement Gathering
clientRequirements.description: Work directly with real clients, understand their needs, and translate requirements into technical solutions.

aiTools.title: AI Development Tools
aiTools.description: Master Cursor, Lovable, Netlify, and GitHub. Leverage AI agents for rapid prototyping and efficient development.

fullScale.title: Full-Scale Development
fullScale.description: Build and deploy complete websites for Harvard Medical School and Boston Children's Hospital projects.

teamwork.title: Cross-Functional Teamwork
teamwork.description: Practice professional collaboration, leadership, and communication skills in diverse teams.

aiAgents.title: AI Agent Integration
aiAgents.description: Build functional AI agents for emails, queries, and automation. Create intelligent solutions for real problems.

mentorship.title: Industry Mentorship
mentorship.description: Learn from Google, Xpectrum-AI professionals. Gain insights into real-world tech industry practices.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join our next cohort and transform into an AI development professional.

portfolio.title: Real Projects,
portfolio.subtitle: See the incredible websites and applications our students have built, from healthcare platforms to enterprise AI solutions.

patholife.title: PathoLife - Healthcare Platform
patholife.description: Comprehensive healthcare management platform built by our students, featuring patient management, appointment scheduling, and medical record systems.

xpectrum.title: Xpectrum AI - Enterprise AI Solutions
xpectrum.description: Enterprise-grade AI automation platform developed by our students, showcasing advanced AI agent systems for business operations.

rubul.title: Rubul Mout - Personal Portfolio
rubul.description: Professional portfolio website showcasing full-stack development skills, featuring modern design, responsive layout, and interactive elements built by our student.

curriculum.title: Student Work &
curriculum.subtitle: Access comprehensive learning materials, student presentations, and course resources from our AI Agent Workshop program.

agenticAI.title: Agentic AI Final Presentation
agenticAI.description: Comprehensive presentation showcasing AI development projects, system architectures, and real-world applications.

architecture.title: Architecture Overview
architecture.description: Detailed system architecture documentation and technical specifications for AI projects.

github.title: GitHub & Version Control
github.description: Complete guide to GitHub workflows, version control, and collaborative development practices.

networking.title: Networking Fundamentals
networking.description: Comprehensive networking concepts and protocols essential for modern web development.

projectManagement.title: Project Management Guide
projectManagement.description: Professional project management methodologies and best practices for software development.

vibeCoding.title: Vibe Coding on Lovable AI
vibeCoding.description: Beginner-friendly guide to AI development using Lovable AI platform for absolute beginners.

activities.title: What Students Will Do
activities.subtitle: Comprehensive hands-on experience with cutting-edge AI tools and real-world projects

format.title: Training Format

coaches.title: Leading AI Coaches from Real Industries
coaches.subtitle: Learn from experienced professionals across multiple industries and regions

aiTools.title: Learn Cutting-Edge AI Tools
aiTools.description: Master industry-standard AI tools used in professional software development, including Cursor for prompt-based automation and rapid prototyping.

realProject.title: Real-World Project Development
realProject.description: Participate in developing a complete website for a real customer using AI tools, gaining hands-on experience with client requirements and deliverables.

projectCycle.title: Full Project Lifecycle
projectCycle.description: Experience all phases: customer interviews, requirements gathering, brainstorming, design, development, deployment, feedback collection, and iterative improvements.

aiChatbot.title: AI Chatbot Integration
aiChatbot.description: Integrate cutting-edge AI chatbot solutions for customers, learning advanced AI implementation and customer service automation.

industryTalks.title: Industry Professional Talks
industryTalks.description: Hear from experienced industry professionals about their work and engage in career discussions with AI experts and leaders.

briefing.title: Meet the Head of AI Training
briefing.description: In-person briefing and introduction to the program, team formation, and project assignment.

teams.title: Team Formation
teams.description: Work in collaborative teams on real projects, learning professional teamwork and communication skills.

guidance.title: Regular Guidance & Tutoring
guidance.description: Regular catch-ups for guidance and tutoring, available both offline and online for flexible learning.

presentation.title: Product Presentation
presentation.description: Public show-and-tell presentations with feedback from industry professionals and peers.

graduation.title: Graduation with Certificates
graduation.description: Complete the program with official certificates and portfolio-ready projects for your resume.

team.title: Team of 5+ Experts
team.description: Growing team of experienced AI professionals and industry leaders

experience.title: Industry Experience
experience.description: Experienced AI experts and leaders in development and applications

industries.title: Multiple Industries

bilingual.title: Bilingual Support
bilingual.description: Available in both Mandarin and English for global accessibility

schedule.title: Program Schedule
schedule.description: 5 days per week intensive program with structured learning and hands-on project work.

location.title: Global Presence
location.description: Based in New Zealand and USA with both offline and online options available.

cta.title: Ready to Access These Materials?
cta.subtitle: Join our AI Agent Workshop to get hands-on experience with these materials and build real-world projects with industry mentors.

founders.title: Our
founders.subtitle: Our founders bring decades of experience from Google, enterprise AI, and startup innovation. They're passionate about empowering the next generation of AI developers.

jiayun.name: Jiayun Chen
jiayun.title: Co-Founder
jiayun.passion: My passion is to build effective teams and grow young team members into effective leaders that can succeed in cross cultural work contexts.
jiayun.education: University of Texas at Austin (Computer Science)
jiayun.experience: Experienced engineering leader with over 10 years of experience building large-scale distributed systems and web technologies.
jiayun.previousRole: Former Tech lead for Google Workspace endpoint management in Seattle, leading 10 person US team as well as helping scale cross continental teams.
jiayun.founding: Founded Xpectrum-AI, building initial startup engineering team and creating digital agent solutions.

owen.name: Owen Xu
owen.title: Co-Founder
owen.passion: I'm passionate about sharing my career experience and equipping the next generation with AI skills to thrive in our rapidly evolving technological landscape.
education: Huazhong University of Science and Technology (Mech. Eng.)
University of Missouri at Columbia (Mech. Eng.)
owen.experience: Over 10 years of experience as an engineer, data analyst, and business analyst across multiple industries in the US and NZ, including petroleum, government, transportation, insurance, fintech, and AI.
owen.founding: Founded Brigen.AI, building AI tool for job matching and resume building and creating a central platform for skilled migration in APAC.

cta.title: Learn from Industry Leaders
cta.subtitle: Our founders bring real-world experience from Google, enterprise AI, and successful startups. Learn directly from leaders who've built and scaled AI systems at the highest levels.

callToAction.title: Ready to Build Real Projects with
